reviews.text: had a good week, this hotel is very pleasent and freindly. the staff and entertainers are really nice people. the hotel was very clean but the food can be a bit bland but i am a fussy eater, but remeber they do have to cater for a lot of guests and for that it was ok my advice is if they say what time lunch/dinner/breakie starts go at that time as the food is at its best. other guest can be a bit rude thou be warned.
reviews.title: smashing place

reviews.text: they do provide a free bus to the beach and its a must. you can walk but catch the bus if you dont like the shop keepers asking you to come and look all the time.
reviews.title: Great budget all inclusive hotel

reviews.text: there is a great resterant called cha cha's here you can have a good meal and drink. the staff are excellent and very freindly, very good with children. i recommned you go here.
reviews.title: BAD BAD BAD.Never again.Holiday from hell.

likes.liked: — the staff in the turkish bath

reviews.text: dont forget to take a tenner for your visa on entry to the country.
reviews.title: great hotel.

likes.liked: — the cleanliness and easy access to the beach.

reviews.text: A lovely value hotel. the staff are super friendly, they made my family feel completely at home. The hotel is no ritz. - its basic but clean. The food is in plentiful supply but of course dont expect silver service. Its a great value hotel that does what it says on the tin.
reviews.title: A great value hotel

reviews.text: All of my family are vegetarian and the staff went out of their way to cater for them.
reviews.title: grant

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed September 2009, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: In summary, expect a good clean hotel with edible free food and you will be pleasantly surprised. If you go expecting a 5 star, then you will be dissapointed.
reviews.title: Excellent hotel, great value for money

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed September 2009, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: My family would be very happy to stay there again and the staff made it a memorable stay for them.
reviews.title: Blue Star Good. Antalya Airport is a rip off!

reviews.text: HOTEL BLUE STAR JUST RETURNED FROM THE HOTEL I WILL DO THIS ON A GOOD POINT BAD POINT REVIEW
reviews.title: A BIG hotel with bad service and no swedes

reviews.text: When we arrived our room was not ready so we where told to go and get some breakfast and shown to the resturant. we where later shown to our room what was very clean and both overlooked the pool and resturant. There where two large pools and two small pools my daughter spent most of the holiday in the swiming pool. The rooms where cleaned every day. Some of our party are very fussy eaters but they found something to eat every meal time, There wasnt many english people there but this didnt matter to us as we were encouraged to join in all the activities along with the other guests. We enjoyed ourselves and made most welcome by the staff at the hotel, we would go back to this hotel again in the future. The hotel didnt haft to be full of english people you make your own holiday and we enjoyed ours.
reviews.title: Good Holiday

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed July 2007, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Good start... spent almost 5 hours @ the airport because our transfer failed to turn up. arrived after midnight, not offered a drink or meal. NONE of the staff seemed to be able or willing to speak English. The main customers were groups of German teenage boys, that just sat about drinking.. they never seemed to go out to any discos BUT went loopy @ night.. shouting banging on doors and playing Jerry & the pacemakers very loud. Thus we were unable to sleep. I had words... they could not understand... neither could most of the Managers apart from the night manager.. he merely said they were on holiday !!!!
reviews.title: Great...if you are a teenage German boy !!!

likes.liked: — shutting the door on the way out
